benchmark_details.name: TempAnswerQA
benchmark_details.overview: TempAnswerQA is a benchmark distilled from Test of Time and TempTabQA, focusing on numerical temporal question answering to evaluate models beyond exact match (EM) metrics.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a specialized evaluation procedure for temporal QA tasks that captures continuous error metrics.

data.source: Constructed from existing temporal QA benchmarks including Test of Time and TempTabQA.
data.annotation: Questions classified as requiring temporal answers and annotated for expected answer formats.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on the absolute differences between expected and predicted temporal answers.
methodology.interpretation: Smaller values in sMAPE and MASE indicate better model performance, emphasizing the importance of error magnitude.
